name: Cross Country Skiing - 3D Winter Mountain Championship Sport Racing Simulator Pro
name_original: Cross Country Skiing - 3D Winter Mountain Championship Sport Racing Simulator Pro
description:
***This Version has NO ADS***

Get ready to shred the slopes in this extreme skiing game! See how far you can get before crashing. Ski along a road taking sharp corners and avoiding falling rocks and avalanches. A new type of skiing adventure awaits!

Features:
- High quality 3D environment
- Falling Rock Hazards
- Realistic Physics
